#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
bool prime[1000001];
void primearrayformation(){
	int i,p;
	prime[1]=false;
	 for (p=2;p*p<=1000000;p++)
    {
        if (prime[p] == true)
        {
            for (i=p*2;i<=1000000;i+=p)
                prime[i]=false;
        }
    }
}
int main(){
	
	int n,i;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	int a[n];
	for(i=0;i<1000001;i++){
		prime[i]=true;
	}
	primearrayformation();
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	scanf("%d",&a[i]);
	int q;
	scanf("%d",&q);
	while(q--){
	    int l,r,count=0;
	    scanf("%d%d",&l,&r);
	    for(i=0;i<n;i++){
	    	if(a[i]>=l&&a[i]<=r&&prime[a[i]]==true)
	    	count++;
	    }
	    printf("%d\n",count);
	}
}
